bundle_et.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_et.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_et.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_et.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_et.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_et.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_et.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_et.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_et.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_et.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_et.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_et.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_et.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_et.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_et.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_et.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_et.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_et.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.water.description: Sageli kasutatud jahutamiseks ja jtme ttluseks.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.oil.description: Seda saab pleteda, hku lasta vi kasutada jahutamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Kige efektiivsem vedelik asjade maha jahutamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output.
bundle_et.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_et.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_et.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_et.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_et.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_et.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_et.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.
bundle_et.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_et.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks.
bundle_et.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_et.properties.unit.dagger.description: A basic ground unit. Useful in swarms.
bundle_et.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced, armored ground unit. Attacks both ground and air targets.
bundle_et.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_et.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_et.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_et.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_et.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_et.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_et.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_et.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_et.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_et.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_et.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_et.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes scrap into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_et.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_et.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_et.properties.block.power-void.description: Hvitab kik materjalid, mis sinna lhevad. Ainult liivakastis.
bundle_et.properties.block.power-source.description: Annab vlja lpmatult elektrit. Ainult liivakastis.
bundle_et.properties.block.item-source.description: Annab vlja lpmatult materjale. Ainult liivakastis.
bundle_et.properties.block.item-void.description: Hvitab kik materjalid, mis sinna lhevad elektrit kasutamata. Ainult liivakastis.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Annab vlja lpmatult vedelikke. Ainult liivakastis.
bundle_et.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_et.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_et.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_et.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_et.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_et.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_et.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_et.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_et.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_et.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_et.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_et.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_et.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_et.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Arenenud transpordi ehitis. Lubab transportida materjale le iga pinnase ja ehitise 3 ruudu kaugusele.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_et.properties.block.router.description: Vtab vastu materjale hest suunast ja annab neid vrdselt vlja kolmes suunas. Kasulik hest allikast tulevate materjalide jagamisel mitmeks.
bundle_et.properties.block.distributor.description: Arenenud jagaja, mis jagab materjale kuni 7 suunas.
bundle_et.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router that only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_et.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_et.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Odav ja aeglane pump, mis ei vaja elektrit.
bundle_et.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_et.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Hoiustab suure hulga vedelikke. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Ttab kui sild kahele ristuvale torule. Kasulik situatsioonides kui kaks erinevat toru viivad kahte erinevat vedelikku eri kohtadesse.
bundle_et.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Arenenud vedeliku transport. Lubab transportida vedelikke le iga pinnase ja ehitise 3 ruudu kaugusele.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_et.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_et.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_et.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_et.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_et.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_et.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_et.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_et.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_et.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_et.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_et.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_et.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_et.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_et.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_et.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_et.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_et.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_et.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_et.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores into industry-ready pods.
bundle_et.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_et.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_et.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_et.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_et.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_et.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_et.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_et.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_et.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_et.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_et.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_et.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_et.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_et.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_et.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_et.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_et.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_et.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_et.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_et.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_et.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_et.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_et.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_et.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_et.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_et.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_et.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_et.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_et.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_et.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.

N'importe qui sur le mme [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi ou rseau local []devrait voir votre serveur sur leur liste des serveurs.

Si vous voulez que les gens puissent s'y connecter de partout  l'aide de votre IP, [accent]le transfert de port (port forwarding)[] est demand.

bundle_fr.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_fr.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_fr.properties.settings.clear.confirm: tes-vous sr d'effacer ces donnes ?\nCe qui est fait ne peut tre dfait !
bundle_fr.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]ATTENTION![]\nCet action effacera toutes les donnes , incluant les sauvegarges, les cartes, les dblocages et la configuration des touches.\nUne fois que vous aurez press 'ok' le jeu effacera toutes les donnes et se fermera.

bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.drill: Le minage manuel est inefficace.\n[accent]Des foreuses[]peuvent miner automatiquement.\nPlacez-en une sur un filon de cuivre.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Les Tapis roulants[] sont utiliss pour transporter des objets jusqu' la base.\nFaites une ligne de tapis roulants de la foreuse  la base .
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.turret: Des constructions dfensives doivent tre construites pour repousser [LIGHT_GRAY]les ennemis[].Construisez une tourelle "duo" prs de votre base.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Les tourelles "Duo" ont besoin de [accent]munitions en cuivre[] pour tirer.\nPlacez une foreuse  ct de la tourelle pour l'approvisionner avec du cuivre.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.waves: Les [LIGHT_GRAY]ennemies[] approchent.\n\nDfendez votre base pour 2 vagues. Construisez plus de tourelles.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_fr.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_fr.properties.item.copper.description: Un matriau de construction utile. Utilis intensivement dans tout les blocs.
bundle_fr.properties.item.lead.description: Un matriau de dpart. Utilis intensivement en lectronique et pour le transport de blocs.
bundle_fr.properties.item.metaglass.description: Un compos de vitre super-rsistant. Utilis largement pour le transport et le stockage de liquides.
bundle_fr.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_fr.properties.item.sand.description: Un matriau commun utilis largement dans la fonte,  la fois dans l'alliage et comme un flux.
bundle_fr.properties.item.coal.description: Un carburant commun et facile  obtenir.
bundle_fr.properties.item.titanium.description: Un mtal rare super-lger largement utilis dans le transport de liquides et d'objets ainsi que dans les foreuses de haut-niveau et l'aviation.
bundle_fr.properties.item.thorium.description: Un mtal dense et radioactif utilis comme support structurel et comme carburant nuclaire.
bundle_fr.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_fr.properties.item.silicon.description: Un matriau semi-conducteur extrmement utile, avec des utilisations dans les panneaux solaires et dans beaucoup d'autre composants lectroniques complexes.
bundle_fr.properties.item.plastanium.description: Un matriau lger et docile utilis dans l'aviation avance et dans les munitions  fragmentation.
bundle_fr.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Une substance au poids quasiment inexistant utilis pour l'lectronique avanc et la technologie auto-rparatrice.
bundle_fr.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Un alliage avanc avec des proprits lectriques avances.
bundle_fr.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_fr.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Un compos volatile utilis dans les bombes et les explosifs. Bien qu'il puisse tre utilis comme carburant, ce n'est pas conseill.
bundle_fr.properties.item.pyratite.description: Une substance extrmement inflammable utilise dans les armes incendiaires.
bundle_fr.properties.liquid.water.description: Couramment utilis pour le refroidissement et le traitement des dchets.
bundle_fr.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_fr.properties.liquid.oil.description: Peut tre brl, utilis comme explosif ou comme liquide de refroidissement.
bundle_fr.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Le liquide de refroidissement le plus efficace.
bundle_fr.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Le mcha standard.  une vitesse et des dgts dcents; Il peut aussi crer jusqu' 3 drones pour infliger des dgts supplmentaires.
bundle_fr.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Un mcha rapide, avec une armure lgre, fait pour des tactiques de harclements. Il inflige, par contre, peu de dgts aux structures, nanmoins il peut tuer de grand groupes d'ennemis trs rapidement avec ses arcs lectriques.
bundle_fr.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Un mcha de support. Soigne les blocs allis en tirant dessus. Il peut aussi teindre les feux et soigner ses allis en zone avec sa comptence.
bundle_fr.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Un mcha cuirass et large fait pour les assauts frontaux. Sa comptence "Armure" lui permet de bloquer 90% des dgts.
bundle_fr.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Le vaisseau standard. Raisonnablement rapide et lger. Il a nanmoins peu d'attaque et une faible vitesse de minage.
bundle_fr.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Un vaisseau qui, bien que lent au dpart, peut acclerer pour atteindre de trs grandes vitesses et voler jusqu'aux avant-postes ennemis, faisant d'normes dgts avec ses arc lectriques obtenus  vitesse maximum et ses missiles.
bundle_fr.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Un grand vaisseau de combat cuirass. Equip avec un fusil automatique  munitions incendiaires. Il a aussi une bonne accleration ainsi qu'une bonne vitesse maximale.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.spirit.description: L'unit de soutien de dpart. Apparat dans la base par dfaut. Mine automatiquement les minerais, rcupre les objets au sol et rpare les blocs.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.phantom.description: Une unit de soutien avance. Mine automatiquement les minerais, rcupre les objets au sol et rpare les blocs. Bien plus efficace qu'un drone spirituel.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.dagger.description: Une unit terrestre basiquee. Utile en arme.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.titan.description: Une unit terrestre cuirasse avance. Attaque les units terrestres comme ariennes.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.wraith.description: Une unit volante rapide harcelant les ennemis .Utilise du plomb comme munitions.
bundle_fr.properties.unit.ghoul.description: Un bombardier lourd . Utilise de la pyratite ou des explosifs comme munitions.
bundle_fr.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_fr.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_fr.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Utilise du sable, du charbon et de l'nergie afin de produire du silicone.
bundle_fr.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_fr.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produit du plastanium  partir de ptrole et de titane.
bundle_fr.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produit du tissu phas  partir de thorium et de grandes quantits de sable.
bundle_fr.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produit un alliage supercharg  l'aide de titane de plomb de silicone et de cuivre.
bundle_fr.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combine de l'eau et du titane en un liquide cryognique bien plus efficace pour refroidir.
bundle_fr.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Utilise du ptrole pour transformer la pyratite en un mlange explosif moins inflammable mais plus explosif que la pyratite.
bundle_fr.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mlange charbon, plomb et sable en l'hautement inflammable pyratite.
bundle_fr.properties.block.melter.description: chauffe de la pierre  de trs hautes tempratures pour obtenir de la lave.
bundle_fr.properties.block.separator.description: Expose la pierre  de l'eau sous pression afin d'obtenir diffrents minraux contenus dansla pierre.
bundle_fr.properties.block.pulverizer.description: crase la pierre pour en faire du sable. Utile quand il y a un manque de sable naturel.
bundle_fr.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_fr.properties.block.incinerator.description: Permet de se dbarasser de n'importe quel objet ou liquide en exces .
bundle_fr.properties.block.power-void.description: Supprime toute l'nergie allant  l'intrieur.Bac  sable uniquement
bundle_fr.properties.block.power-source.description: Produit de l'nergie  l'infini. Bac  sable uniquement.
bundle_fr.properties.block.item-source.description: Produit des objets  l'infini. Bac  sable uniquement .
bundle_fr.properties.block.item-void.description: Dsintgre n'importe quel objet qui va  l'intrieur sans utiliser d'nergie. Bac  sable uniquement.
bundle_fr.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Source de liquide infinie . Bac  sable uniquement.
bundle_fr.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Un bloc dfensif  faible cot.\nUtile pour protger la base et les tourelles dans les premires lors des premires vagues.
bundle_fr.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Un bloc dfensif  faible cot.\nUtile pour protger la base et les tourelles dans les premires lors des premires vagues.\nFait du 2 sur 2.
bundle_fr.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_fr.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fr.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Un bloc dfensif puissant.\nProcure une trs bonne protection contre les ennemis.
bundle_fr.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Un bloc dfensif puissant.\nProcure une trs bonne protection contre les ennemis.\nFait du 2 sur 2.
bundle_fr.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Moins puissant qu'un mur en Thorium mais dviera les balles sauf si elles sont trop puissantes.
bundle_fr.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Moins puissant qu'un mur en Thorium mais dviera les balles sauf si elles sont trop puissantes.\nFait du 2 sur 2.
bundle_fr.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Le plus puissant bloc dfensif .\nA une faible chance de crer des clairs vers les ennemis .
bundle_fr.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Le plus puissant bloc dfensif .\nA une faible chance de crer des clairs vers les ennemis .\nFait du 2 sur 2.
bundle_fr.properties.block.door.description: Une petite porte pouvant tre ouverte et ferme en appuyant dessus.\nSi elle est ouverte les ennemis peuvent tirer et passer  travers.
bundle_fr.properties.block.door-large.description: Une large porte pouvant tre ouverte et ferme en appuyant dessus.\nSi elle est ouverte les ennemis peuvent tirer et passer  travers.\nFait du 2 sur 2.
bundle_fr.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fr.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Soigne priodiquement les batiments autour de lui.
bundle_fr.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Acclre les batiments autour de lui, notamment les foreuses et les convoyeurs.
bundle_fr.properties.block.force-projector.description: Cre un champ de force hexagonal autour de lui qui protge les batiments et les units  l'intrieur de prendre des dgts  cause des balles.
bundle_fr.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Blesse les ennemis qui marchent dessus. Quasiment invisble pour l'ennemi.
bundle_fr.properties.block.conveyor.description: Convoyeur basique servant  transporter des objets. Les objets dplacs en avant sont automatiquement dposs dans les tourelles ou les batiments. Peut tre tourn.
bundle_fr.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Convoyeur avanc . Dplace les objets plus rapidement que les convoyeurs standards.
bundle_fr.properties.block.junction.description: Agit comme un pont pour deux ligne de convoyeurs se croisant. Utile lorsque deux diffrents convoyeurs dplacent diffrents matriaux  diffrents endroits.
bundle_fr.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: bloc de transport avanc permettant de traverser jusqu' 3 blocs de n'importe quel terrain ou batiment.
bundle_fr.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: convoyeur trs avanc . Utilise de l'nergie pour tlporter des objets  un convoyeur phas connect jusqu' une longue distance .
bundle_fr.properties.block.sorter.description: Trie les articles. Si un article rcorrespond  la slection, il peut passer. Autrement, l'article est distribu vers la gauche ou la droite.
bundle_fr.properties.block.router.description: Accepte les objets depuis une ou plus directions et le renvoie dans n'importe quelle direction. Utile pour sparer une chane de convoyeurs en plusieurs.[accent]Le seul et l'Unique[]
bundle_fr.properties.block.distributor.description: Un routeur avanc qui spare les objets jusqu' 7 autres directions quitablement.
bundle_fr.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: C'est la combinaison entre un Routeur et un Diviseur qui peut seulement distribuer  gauche et  droite si le chemin de devant est bloqu.
bundle_fr.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Batiment de transport d'objet [accent]ultime[]. Collecte un grand nombre d'objets puis les tire  un autre transporteur de masse sur une trs longue distance.
bundle_fr.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Une pompe de faible prix pompant lentement, mais ne consomme pas d'nergie.
bundle_fr.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Une pompe avance qui double sa vitesse en utilisant de l'nergie.
bundle_fr.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: La pompe ultime . Trois fois plus rapide qu'une pompe mcanique et la seule pompe capable de rcuprer de la lave.
bundle_fr.properties.block.conduit.description: tuyau basique permettant le transport de liquide . Marche comme un convoyeur mais avec les liquides. Utile si utilis avec des extracteurs, des pompes ou d'autres conduits.
bundle_fr.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: tuyau avanc permettant le transport de liquide . Transporte les liquides plus rapidement et en stocke plus que les tuyaux standards.
bundle_fr.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepte les liquide en une direction et les rejete de tout les cts quitablement. Peut aussi stocker une certaine quantit de liquide. Utile pour envoyer un liquide  plusieurs endroits.
bundle_fr.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stocke une grande quantit de liquides . Utile pour rguler la sortie quand la demande est inconstante ou comme scurit pour refroidir des batiments important.
bundle_fr.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Agit comme une intersection pour deux conduits se croisant.Utile si deux conduits amnent diffrents liquides  diffrents endroits.
bundle_fr.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: bloc de transport de liquide avanc . Permet le transport de liquides jusqu' 3 blocs de n'importe quel terrain ou batiment .
bundle_fr.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: tuyau trs avanc permettant le transport de liquide. Utilise de l'nergie pour tlporter les liquides  un autre tuyau phas sur une longue distance.
bundle_fr.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmet l'nergie aux transmetteurs nergtiques connects . Jusqu' quatre sources d'nergie, consommateurs ou transmetteurs peuvent tre connects. Le transmetteur recevra de l'nergie ou le transmettra  n'importe quel batiment adjacent.
bundle_fr.properties.block.power-node-large.description: A un plus grand rayon que le transmetteur nergtique standard et jusqu' six sources d'nergie, consommateurs ou transmetteurs peuvent tre connects.
bundle_fr.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_fr.properties.block.battery.description: Stocke l'nergie quand elle est en abondance et le distribue si il y a trop peu d'nergie tant qu'il lui reste de l'nergie.
bundle_fr.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stocke bien plus d'nergie qu'une batterie normale.
bundle_fr.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Gnre de l'nergie en brlant du ptrole ou des matriaux inflammables.
bundle_fr.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Gnre une grande quantit d'nergie  partir de lave .
bundle_fr.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: Plus efficace qu'un gnrateur  combustion, mais requiert de l'eau .
bundle_fr.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_fr.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Un gnrateur thermo-lectrique  radioisotope qui ne demande pas de refroidissement mais produit moins d'nergie qu'un racteur  Thorium.
bundle_fr.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Gnre bien plus d'nergie qu'un panneau solaire standard, Mais est aussi bien plus cher  construire.
bundle_fr.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Gnre normment d'nergie  l'aide de la radioactivit du thorium. Requiert nanmoins un refroidissement constant. Explosera violemment en cas de surchauffe.
bundle_fr.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_fr.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Une foreuse de faible cot. Si elle est place sur  un endroit appropri, produit des matriaux lentement  l'infini.
bundle_fr.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Une foreuse amlior plus rapide et capable de forer des matriaux plus dur grce  l'usage de vrins  air comprim.
bundle_fr.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Permet de forer bien plus vite grce  la technologie laser, cela demande nanmoins de l'nergie . Additionnellement, le thorium, un matriau radioactif, peut-tre rcupr avec cette foreuse.
bundle_fr.properties.block.blast-drill.description: La Foreuse ultime . Demande une grande quantit d'nergie .
bundle_fr.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extrait l'eau des nappes phratiques. Utile quand il n'y a pas d'eau  proximit.
bundle_fr.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultive le sol avec de l'eau afin d'obtenir de la biomasse.
bundle_fr.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Utilise une grande quantit d'nergie afin d'extraire du ptrole du sable . Utile quand il n'y a pas de lacs de ptrole  proximit.
bundle_fr.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_fr.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_fr.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_fr.properties.block.vault.description: Stocke un grand nombre d'objets. Utile pour rguler le flux d'objet quand la demande de matriaux est inconstante.un [LIGHT_GRAY] dchargeur[] peut tre utilis pour rcuprer des objets depuis le coffre-fort.
bundle_fr.properties.block.container.description: Stocke un petit nombre d'objet . Utile pour rguler le flux d'objet quand la demande de matriaux est inconstante.un [LIGHT_GRAY] dchargeur[] peut tre utilis pour rcuprer des objets depuis le conteneur.
bundle_fr.properties.block.unloader.description: Dcharge des objets depuis des conteneurs, coffres-forts ou de la base sur un convoyeur ou directement dans un bloc adjacent . Le type d'objet peut tre chang en appuyant sur le dchargeur.
bundle_fr.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_fr.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_fr.properties.block.duo.description: une petite tourelle avec un cot faible .
bundle_fr.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_fr.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_fr.properties.block.wave.description: une tourelle de taille moyenne tirant rapidement des bulles de liquide .
bundle_fr.properties.block.lancer.description: une tourelle de taille moyenne tirant des rayons chargs en lectricit.
bundle_fr.properties.block.arc.description: une petite tourelle tirant des arcs lectrques vers les ennemis.
bundle_fr.properties.block.swarmer.description: une tourelle de taille moyenne qui tire des missiles qui se dispersent.
bundle_fr.properties.block.salvo.description: une tourelle de taille moyenne qui tire par salves.
bundle_fr.properties.block.fuse.description: Une grande tourelle qui tire de puissants rayons lasers avec une faible porte.
bundle_fr.properties.block.ripple.description: Une grande tourelle d'artillerie qui tire plusieurs tirs simultanment.
bundle_fr.properties.block.cyclone.description: Une grande tourelle tirant rapidement ... trs rapidement .
bundle_fr.properties.block.spectre.description: Une grande tourelle qui tire deux puissantes balles simultanment.
bundle_fr.properties.block.meltdown.description: Une grande tourelle tirant de puissants rayons lasers avec une grande porte.
bundle_fr.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produit des petits drones qui rparent les batiments et minent des matriaux.
bundle_fr.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produit des drones avancs qui sont bien plus efficaces que les drones spirituels.
bundle_fr.properties.block.wraith-factory.description: Produit des intercepteurs rapides qui harclent l'ennemi.
bundle_fr.properties.block.revenant-factory.description: Produit des units terrestres lourdes avec des lasers.
bundle_fr.properties.block.titan-factory.description: Produit des units terrestres avances et cuirasses.
bundle_fr.properties.block.fortress-factory.description: Produit des units terrestres d'artillerie lourde .
bundle_fr.properties.block.repair-point.description: Soigne en continu l'unit blesse la plus proche tant qu'elle est  sa porte.
bundle_fr.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_fr.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Quitte ton mcha ou ton vaisseau actuel pour un mcha rapide mais peu rsistant fait pour les stratgies de harclement.\nUtilisez le reconstructeur en double cliquant dessus lorsque vous tes dessus.
bundle_fr.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Quitte ton mcha ou ton vaisseau actuel pour un mcha de support qui peut soigner les batiments et units allies.\nUtilisez le reconstructeur en double cliquant dessus lorsque vous tes dessus.
bundle_fr.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Quitte ton mcha ou ton vaisseau actuel pour un mcha cuirass et large, fait pour les assauts frontaux .\nUtilisez le reconstructeur en double cliquant dessus lorsque vous tes dessus.
bundle_fr.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Quitte ton mcha ou ton vaisseau actuel pour un intercepteur rapide et puissant avec des armes lectriques.\nUtilisez le reconstructeur en double cliquant dessus lorsque vous tes dessus.
bundle_fr.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Quitte ton mcha ou ton vaisseau actuel pour un bombardier lourd raisonnablement cuirass .\nUtilisez le reconstructeur en double cliquant dessus lorsque vous tes dessus.
bundle_fr.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Quitte ton mcha ou ton vaisseau actuel pour un large vaisseau cuirass .\nUtilisez le reconstructeur en double cliquant dessus lorsque vous tes dessus.

Ces dchets sont vastes, imprvisibles, et sillonn de structures du secteur dsaffects.
Le charbon est prsent dans la rgion. Brulez-le pour obtenir de l'nergie ou synthtisez du graphite.

bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: Aux abords du dsert se trouvent les marais salants. Peu de ressources peuvent tre trouves  cet endroit.\n\nL'ennemi a rig un complexe de stockage de ressources ici. radiquer leur base. Ne laisser rien debout.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.craters.description: L'eau s'est accumule dans ce cratre, vestige des guerres anciennes. Rcuprer la zone. Recueillir du sable. Cr du Mtaverre. Pomper de l'eau pour refroidir les tourelles et les perceuses.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Pass les dchets, c'est le rivage. Une fois, cet endroit a abrit un rseau de dfense ctire. Il n'en reste pas beaucoup. Seules les structures de dfense les plus lmentaires restent indemnes, tout le reste tant rduit  nant.\nContinuer l'expansion vers l'extrieur. Redcouvrez la technologie.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Plus  l'intrieur des terres se trouvent les montagnes, non pollues par les spores.
Extraire le titane abondant dans cette zone. Et apprennez comment l'utiliser.

La prsence de l'ennemi est plus grande ici. Ne leur donnez pas le temps d'envoyer leurs units les plus fortes.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: Cette zone est envahie par la vgtation, plus proche de la source des spores.\nL'ennemi a tabli un avant-poste ici. Construire des units de poignard. Detruis-le. Et repprennez ce qui a t perdu !
bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
La priphrie d'une zone de production de ptrole, entre les montagnes et le dsert. Une des rares zones avec des rserves de goudron utilisables.
Bien qu'abandonne, cette zone a des forces ennemies dangereuses  proximit. Ne les sous-estimez pas.

[lightgray]Rechercher la technologie de traitement de ptrole si possible.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: Une zone extrmement dangereuse. Ressources abondantes, mais peu d'espace. Risque lev de destruction. Pars le plus vite possible.\nNe vous laissez pas berner par le long espacement entre les attaques ennemies.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
Une ancienne installation de production et de traitement de thorium, rduite  nant.
[lightgray]Recherche sur le thorium et ses nombreuses utilisations.

L'ennemi est prsent ici en grand nombre, recherchant constamment des assaillants.
