bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drill: Handmatig delven is inefficint.\n[accent]Boren []kunnen automatisch delven.\nPlaats er een op een koperader.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Transportbanden[] worden gebruikt om artikelen naar de kern te transporteren.\nMaak een lijn van transportbanden van de boor tot de kern.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.turret: Er moeten verdedigingsstructuren worden gebouwd om de[LIGHT_GRAY] vijand[]af te weren.\nBouw een duo geschutstoren in de buurt van je basis.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo geschutstorens hebben[accent] koper ammunitie []nodig om te schieten.\nPlaats een boor naast de geschutstoren om het van gedolven koper te voorzien.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.waves: De [LIGHT_GRAY] vijand[] nadert.\n\nVerdedig jouw kern voor 2 golven. Bouw meer geschutstorens.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.dagger.description: A basic ground unit. Useful in swarms.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced, armored ground unit. Attacks both ground and air targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes scrap into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router that only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores into industry-ready pods.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.

bundle_pl.properties.map.nospawn.pvp: Ta mapa nie ma adnego rdzenia przeciwnika, aby mogli si zrespi przeciwnicy! Dodaj[SCARLET] inny ni niebieski[] rdze do mapy w edytorze.
bundle_pl.properties.map.nospawn.attack: Ta mapa nie ma adnego rdzenia przeciwnika, aby mona byo go zaatakowa! Dodaj[SCARLET] czerwony[] rdze do mapy w edytorze.

bundle_pl.properties.editor.errorimage: To obraz, nie mapa. Nie zmieniaj rozszeenia spodziewajc sie e to co zmieni.\n\nJeli chcesz zaimportowa starsz map, uyj przycisku importuj starsz map w edytorze.

bundle_pl.properties.launch.confirm: Spowoduje to wystrzelenie wszystkich surowcw w rdzeniu.\nNie bdziesz mg wrci do tej bazy.
bundle_pl.properties.launch.skip.confirm: If you skip now, you will not be able to launch until later waves.

bundle_pl.properties.error.mismatch: Bd pakietu:\nprawdopodobne niedopasowanie klienta/serwera.\nUpewnij si, e ty i host macie najnowsz wersj Mindustry!
bundle_pl.properties.error.bloom: Failed to initialize bloom.\nYour device may not support it.

bundle_pl.properties.zone.impact0078.name: Uderzenie 0078
bundle_pl.properties.zone.crags.name: Urwisko
bundle_pl.properties.zone.fungalPass.name: Fungal Pass
bundle_pl.properties.zone.groundZero.description: Optymalna lokalizacja, aby rozpocz jeszcze raz. Niskie zagroenie. Niewiele zasobw.\nZbierz jak najwicej miedzi i oowiu, tyle ile jest moliwe.\nPrzejd do nastpnej strefy jak najszybciej.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Nawet tutaj, bliej gr, zarodniki rozprzestrzeniy si. Niskie temperatury nie mog ich zatrzyma na zawsze.\n\nRozpocznij przedsiwzicie od wadzy. Buduj generatory spalinowe. Naucz si korzysta z naprawiaczy.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
W gbi ldu le gry, jeszcze nieskaone przez zarodniki.
Wydobd obfity tytan w tym obszarze. Dowiedz si, jak z niego korzysta.

Obecno wroga jest tutaj wiksza. Nie daj im czasu na wysanie swoich najsilniejszych jednostek.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: Obszar ten jest zaronity, bliej rda zarodnikw.\nWrg zaoy tu placwk. Zbuduj jednostki N. Zniszcz to. Odzyskaj to, co nam odebrano.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
Obrzea strefy produkcji ropy, midzy grami a pustyni. Jeden z niewielu obszarw z rezerwami uytecznej smoy.
Mimo e ta strefa jest opuszczona, w pobliu znajduj si niebezpieczne siy wroga.  Nie lekcewa ich.

[lightgray]Jeli to moliwe, zbadaj technologi przetwarzania oleju.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: Strefa wyjtkowo niebezpieczna. Opfita w zasoby ale mao miejsca. Wysokie ryzyko zniszczenia. Opu t strefe jak najszybciej. Nie daj si zwie dugiemu odstpowi midzy atakami wroga.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
Dawny zakad produkcji i przetwarzania toru, zredukowny do ruin.
[lightgray]Zbadaj tor i jego zastosowania.

Wrg jest tutaj obecny w duej iloci, nieustannie poszukuje napastnikw.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_pl.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Czy jeste pewien e chcesz usun te dane?\nPo tym nie ma powrotu!
bundle_pl.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]UWAGA![]\nTo wykasuje wszystkie dane, wcznie z zapisanymi grami i mapami, ustawienami, i znanymi technologiami.\nKiedy naciniesz 'ok', gra usunie wszystkie swoje dane i automatycznie wyczy si.

bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.intro:
Wszede do[scarlet] Samouczka Mindustry.[]
Zacznij od[accent] wydobycia miedzi[]. Aby to zrobi, dotknij yy rudy miedzi w pobliu rdzenia.

[accent]{0}/{1} mied
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.drill:
Wydobywanie rczne jest nieefektywne.
[accent]Wierta []mog kopa automatycznie.
Kliknij zakadk wierta w prawym dolnym rogu.
Wybierz[accent] wierto mechaniczne[]. Umie go na zou miedzi, klikajc.
[accent]Kliknij prawym przyciskiem myszy[], aby przesta budowa.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.turret:
Once an item enters your core, it can be used for building.
Keep in mind that not all items can be used for building.
Items that are not used for building, such as[accent] coal[] or[accent] scrap[], cannot be put into the core.
Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].
Build a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.
Place a drill near the turret.
Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_pl.properties.item.copper.description: Przydatny materia budowlany. Szeroko uywany w prawie kadej konstrukcji.
bundle_pl.properties.item.lead.description: Podstawowy matria. Uywany w przesyle przemiotw i pynw. Nie jest on przypadkiem szkodliwy?
bundle_pl.properties.item.metaglass.description: Niesamowite silne szko. Szeroko uywane w transporcie i przechowywaniu pynw.
bundle_pl.properties.item.graphite.description: Zmineralizowany wgiel, wykorzystywany do amunicji i izolacji elektrycznej.
bundle_pl.properties.item.sand.description: Zwyky materia uywany pospolicie w przepalaniu, stopach i jako topnik. Dostanie piaskiem po oczach nie jest przyjemne.
bundle_pl.properties.item.coal.description: Zwyky i atwo dostpny materia energetyczny.
bundle_pl.properties.item.titanium.description: Rzadki i bardzo lekki materia. Uywany w bardzo zaawansowanym przewodnictwie, wiertach i samolotach. Poczuj si jak Tytan!
bundle_pl.properties.item.thorium.description: Zwarty i radioaktywny materia uywany w struktucrach i paliwie nuklearnym. Nie trzymaj go w rkach!
bundle_pl.properties.item.scrap.description: Pozostaoci starych budynkw i jednostek. Skada si z maej iloci wszystkiego.
bundle_pl.properties.item.silicon.description: Niesamowicie przydatny pprzewodnk uywany w panelach sonecznych i skomplikowanej elektronice. Nie, w Dolinie Krzemowej ju nie ma krzemu.
bundle_pl.properties.item.plastanium.description: Lekki i plastyczny materia uywany w amunicji odamkowej i samolotach. Uywany te w klockach LEGO (dlatego s niezniszczalne)!
bundle_pl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Niewiarygodnie lekkie wkno uywane w zaawansowanej elektronice i technologii samo-naprawiajcej si.
bundle_pl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Zaawansowany materia z niesychanymi wartociami energetycznymi.
bundle_pl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Uywany do wyrobu oleju, materiaw wybuchowych i paliwa.
bundle_pl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Lotny zwizek uywany w pirotechnice. Moe by uywany jako materia energetyczny, ale nie polecam, ale i tak warto sprbowa.
bundle_pl.properties.item.pyratite.description: Niesamowicie palny zwizek uywany w zbrojeniu. Nielegalny w 9 pastwach.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.water.description: Powszechnie uywana do schadzania budowli i przetwarzania odpadw.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Moe si pali, eksplodowa lub by uywana do schadzania.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Standardowy mech. rednia bro i prdko, le potrafi stworzy trzy mae drony do walki.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Szybki i wraliwy mech stworzony do szybkih atakw i ucieczki. Budynk robi prawie nic, lec jest wstanie szybko rozwali grup wrogich jednostek piorunami.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Mech pomocny. Naprawia budynki druyny, strzelajc w nie. Potrafi wygasi niedalekie poary i uleczy bliskich przyjaci.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Duy i silny mech, zaprojektowany na ataki. Jego zdolno pozwala mu na zablokowanie do 90% obrae.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Standardowy statek. Lekki i szybki, ale jest kiepski jak chodzi o walk i kopanie.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Statek do ataku i szybkiej ucieczki. Zaczyna powoli, ale przyspiesza do wielkiej prdkoci. Przy tej prdkoci, moe przelecie koo wrogiej bazy i atakowa piorunami czy rakietami.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Duy, uzbrojony statek. Dobra prdko i przyspieszenie. Ma ognisty karabin.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.spirit.description: Pocztkowy dron. Rdze zawsze tworzy jeden. Wydobywa surowce, naprawia budynki oraz pomaga przy budowie.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.phantom.description: Zaawansowany dron. Wydobywa surowce, naprawia budynki oraz pomaga przy budowie szybciej ni dron Duch.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.dagger.description: Podstawowy mech ldowy. Sam jest saby, lecz przydatny w duych ilociach.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.crawler.description: Jednostka naziemna skadajca si z rozebranej ramy z przypitymi na grze materiaami wybuchowymi. Niezbyt trway. Wybucha przy kontakcie z wrogami. Chodzi na czterech nogach jak pies.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.titan.description: Bardziej zaawansowany mech ldowy. Atakuje cele ldowe i powietrzne.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.revenant.description: Cika, unoszca sie platforma z rakietami.
bundle_pl.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Kompresuje kawaki wgla w czyste blaszki grafitu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_pl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Redukuje piasek za pomoc wysoce czystego wgla w celu wytworzenia krzemu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.kiln.description: Stapia ow i piasek na metaszko. Wymaga maej iloci energii.
bundle_pl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Wytwarza plastan z oleju i tytanu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_pl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_pl.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_pl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_pl.properties.block.melter.description: Przetapia zom na uel do dalszego przetwarzania lub uycia w wieyczkach
bundle_pl.properties.block.separator.description: Oddziel uyteczne materiay z mieszaniny jak jest uel.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Mieli zom w drobny piaske. Przydatne, gdy brakuje naturalnego piasku.
bundle_pl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Pozbywa si nadmiaru przedmiotw lub pynu
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-void.description: Niszczy ca energi wprowadzon do tego bloku. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-source.description: Wydziela prd w nieskoczono. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.item-source.description: Wydziela przedmioty w nieskoczono. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.item-void.description: Niszczy wszystkie przedmioty, ktre id do tego bloku, ktry nie wymaga prdu. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Wydziela ciecz w nieskoczono. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Tani blok obronny.\nPrzydatny do ochrony rdzenia i wieyczek w pierwszych kilku falach.
bundle_pl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Tani blok obronny.\nPrzydatny do ochrony rdzenia i wieyczek w pierwszych kilku falach.\nObejmuje wiele kratek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: Umiarkowanie silny blok obronny.\nZapewnia umiarkowan ochron przed wrogami.
bundle_pl.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: Umiarkowanie silny blok obronny.\nZapewnia umiarkowan ochron przed wrogami.\nObejmuje wiele kratek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Silny blok obronny.\nDobra ochrona przed wrogami.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Silny blok obronny.\nDobra ochrona przed wrogami.\nObejmuje wiele kratek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Nie tak silny jak ciana toru, ale odbije pociski, chyba e bd zbyt potne.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Nie tak silny jak ciana toru, ale odbije pociski, chyba e bd zbyt potne.\nObejmuje wiele kratek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Najsilniejszy blok obronny.\nMa niewielk szans na wywoanie byskawicy w kierunku atakujcego.
bundle_pl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Najsilniejszy blok obronny.\nMa niewielk szans na wywoanie byskawicy w kierunku atakujcego.\nObejmuje wiele kratek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.door.description: Mae drzwi, ktre mona otwiera i zamyka, klikajc na nie.\nJeli s otwarte, wrogowie mog strzela i si przemieszcza przez nie.
bundle_pl.properties.block.door-large.description: Due drzwi, ktre mona otwiera i zamyka, klikajc na nie.\nJeli s otwarte, wrogowie mog strzela i si przemieszcza przez nie.\nObejmuje wiele kratek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_pl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_pl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_pl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_pl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_pl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_pl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_pl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Zaawansowany blok transportujcy. Pozwala na przenoszenie przedmiotw nawet do 3 blokw na kadym terenie, przez kady budynek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.sorter.description: Sortuje przedmioty. Jeli przedmiot pasuje to przechodzi dalej, jeli nie - to przechodzi na boki.
bundle_pl.properties.block.router.description: Akceptuje przedmioty z jednego miejsca i rozdziela je do trzech innych kierunkw. Przydatne w rozdzielaniu materiaw z jednego rda do wielu celw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.distributor.description: Zaawansowany rozdzielacz, rozdzielajcy przedmioty do 7 innych kierunkw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Rozdzielacz, ktry przerzuca przedmioty, kiedy gwna droga jest przepeniona
bundle_pl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Tania pompa o niskiej przepustowoci. Nie wymaga prdu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Zaawansowana pompa, dwukrotnie wiksza przepustowo od mechanicznej pompy. Wymaga prdu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: Najlepsza pompa. Trzy razy szybsza od mechanicznej pompy i jedyna, ktra moe wypompowa law.
bundle_pl.properties.block.conduit.description: Podstawowy blok do przenoszenia cieczy. Dziaa jak transporter, ale na ciecze. Najlepiej uywa z ekstraktorami wody, pompami lub innymi rurami.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Zaawansowany blok do przenoszenia cieczy. Transportuje je szybciej i magazynuje wicej ni standardowe rury.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Akceptuje pyny z jednego kierunku i wyprowadza je do trzech innych kierunkw jednakowo. Moe rwnie przechowywa pewn ilo pynu. Przydatne do dzielenia pynw z jednego rda na wiele celw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Magazynuje ogromne iloci cieczy. Uyj go do stworzenia buforu, gdy wystpuje rne zapotrzebowanie na materiay lub jako zabezpieczenie dla chodzenia wanych blokw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Dziaa jak most dla dwch krzyujcych si rur. Przydatne w sytuacjach, kiedy dwie rury maj rne ciecze do rnych lokacji.
bundle_pl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Zaawansowany blok przenoszcy ciecze. Pozwala na przenoszenie cieczy nawet do 3 blokw na kadym terenie, przez kady budynek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Zaawansowany blok do przenoszenia cieczy. Uywa prdu, aby przenie ciecz do poczonego transportera fazowego przez kilka blokw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-node.description: Przesya moc do poczonych wzw. Mona podczy do czterech rde zasilania, zleww lub wzw. Zasila te bloki ktre go dotykaj.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_pl.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_pl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_pl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_pl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Wytwarza energi poprzez spalanie atwopalnych materiaw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_pl.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: Bardziej wydajny ni generator spalania, ale wymaga dodatkowej wody.
bundle_pl.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_pl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_pl.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_pl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_pl.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Tanie wierto. Kiedy poonone na odpowiednich polach, wysya przedmioty w wolnym tempie.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_pl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_pl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_pl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Wydobywa wod z ziemi. Uyj go, gdy w pobliu nie ma jeziora.
bundle_pl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Uprawia mae skupiska zarodnikw w gotowe do uytku kapsuki.
bundle_pl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_pl.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_pl.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_pl.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_pl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_pl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_pl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_pl.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_pl.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_pl.properties.block.duo.description: Maa, tania wiea. Przydatny przeciwko jednostkom naziemnym.
bundle_pl.properties.block.scatter.description: redniej wielkoci wiea przeciwlotnicza. Rozsiewa ruty z oowiu lub strzpy zomu na jednostki wroga.
bundle_pl.properties.block.scorch.description: Spala wszystkich wrogw naziemnych w pobliu. Bardzo skuteczny z bliskiej odlegoci.
bundle_pl.properties.block.hail.description: Maa wiea artyleryjska, bardzo przydatna, atakuje tylko jednostki naziemne.
bundle_pl.properties.block.wave.description: redniej wielkoci szybkostrzelna wieyczka, ktra wystrzeliwuje pynne bbelki. Gasi ogie jeeli jest w niej woda lub lodociecz
bundle_pl.properties.block.lancer.description: redniej wielkoci wieyczka, ktra strzela naadowanymi wizkami elektrycznoci.
bundle_pl.properties.block.arc.description: Maa wiea bliskiego zasigu, ktra wystrzeliwuje elektryczno losowym ukiem w kierunku wroga.
bundle_pl.properties.block.swarmer.description: redniej wielkoci wieyczka, ktra strzela rakietami wybuchowymi.
bundle_pl.properties.block.fuse.description: Dua wiea, ktra strzela potnymi wizkami krtkiego zasigu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.ripple.description: Dua wiea artyleryjska, ktra strzela jednoczenie kilkoma strzaami.
bundle_pl.properties.block.spectre.description: Dua wiea, ktra strzela dwoma potnymi pociskami jednoczenie.
bundle_pl.properties.block.meltdown.description: Dua wiea, ktra strzela potnymi wizkami dalekiego zasigu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produkuje lekkie drony, ktre naprawiaj bloki.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produkuje zaawansowane drony ktre pomgaj przy budowie.
bundle_pl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Bez przerw ulecza najblisz zniszczon jednostk w jego zasigu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.host.info:
The [accent]Hospedar[]Boto Hopeda um servidor no Host[scarlet]6567[] e [scarlet]6568.[]
Qualquer um no [LIGHT_GRAY]Wi-fi Ou Internet local[] Pode ver este servidor na lista de servidores.

Se voce quer poder entrar em qualquer servidor em seu ip, [accent]port forwarding[]  requerido.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: Se alguem esta com problemas em conectar no seu servidor lan, Tenha certeza que deixou mindustry Acessar sua internet local nas configuraes de firewall
bundle_pt_BR.properties.join.info:
Aqui, Voc pode entar em um [accent]IP De servidor[] Para conectar, Ou descobrir [accent]Servidores[] Da rede local.
Ambos os servidores LAN e WAN So suportados.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: No tem uma lista de servidores automaticos; Se voc quer conectar ao IP de alguem, Voc precisa pedir o IP Ao Rosteador.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.quit.confirm.tutorial: Are you sure you know what you're doing?\nThe tutorial can be re-taken in[accent] Settings->Game->Re-Take Tutorial.[]
bundle_pt_BR.properties.map.delete.confirm: Certeza que quer deletar este mapa? Isto no pode ser desfeito!
bundle_pt_BR.properties.map.nospawn: Esse mapa no contm um [yellow]ncleo[] para o jogador Nascer! [ROYAL]blue[] Coloque um [yellow]ncleo[] no editor de mapa.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.map.nospawn.pvp: Esse mapa no tem ncleos inimigos para os jogadores nascerem! Adicione[SCARLET] Ncleos vermelhos[] no mapa no editor.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.map.nospawn.attack: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to attack! Add[SCARLET] red[] cores to this map in the editor.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.map.invalid: Erro ao carregar o mapa: Arquivo de mapa invalido ou corrupto.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.editor.author: Autor:
bundle_pt_BR.properties.waves.title: Hordas
bundle_pt_BR.properties.waves.invalid: Ondas invlidas na rea de transferncia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.waves.none: No enemies defined.\nNote that empty wave layouts will automatically be replaced with the default layout.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.editor.name: Nome:
bundle_pt_BR.properties.editor.errorimage: Isso  uma imagem, No um mapa. No v por a mudando extenses esperando que funcione.\n\nSe voc quer importar um mapa legacy, Use o boto 'Importar mapa legacy'no editor.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.editor.errorlegacy: Esse mapa  velho demais, E usa um formato de mapa legacy que no  mais suportado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.editor.errorheader: Este arquivo de mapa no  mais valido, Ou esta corrompido.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
