bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.drill: Minerar manualmente  ineficiente.\n[accent]Mineradoras []podem minerar automaticamente.\nColoque uma numa veia de cobre.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Esteiras[] So usadas para transportar itens at o core.\nFaa uma linha de Esteiras da mineradora at o core.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.turret: Estruturas defensivas devem ser construidas para repelir[LIGHT_GRAY] O inimigo[].\nConstrua uma torre dupla perto de sua base.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Torres duplas precisam de[accent] Cobre como munio []Para atirar.\nColoque uma mineradoura Proxima a torre Para carregar ela com cobre minerado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.waves: O[LIGHT_GRAY] Inimigo[] se aproxima.\n\nDefenda seu core por 2 ondas. Construa mais torres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.copper.description: Um material de estrutura util. Usado extensivamente em Maioria dos blocos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.lead.description: Material de comeo basico. usado intensivamente em Blocos de transporte de liquidos e eletronicos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.metaglass.description: Composto de vidro super-Resistente. Extensivamente usado Para distribuio de lquido e armazem.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.sand.description: Um material comum Que  usado intensivamente em derretimento, Tanto em ligas como fluxo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.titanium.description: Um Material raro super leve, metal usado intensivamente na transportao de lquidos, Brocas e Aeronaves.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.thorium.description: Um metal denso e radioativo, Usado como suporte material e combustivel nuclear.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.scrap.description: Pedaos remanescentes de estruturas e unidades destruidas.. Contem traos de diferentes metais.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.silicon.description: Condutor extremamente importante,Com aplicao em paneis solares e dispositivos complexos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.plastanium.description: Leve, Material dutil Usado em aeronaves Avanadas E munio de fragmentao.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Uma substancia quase sem peso Usado em eletronica avanada E tecnologia de auto-reparo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Uma liga com propriedades unicas eletricas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Usado em converso para oleo, Combustivel e explosivos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Um composto volatil usado em bombas em bombas em explosivos. Enquanto pode ser queimado como combustivel, Isso no  recomendado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.pyratite.description: Substancia extremamente inflamavel usado em armas incendiarias.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.water.description: Comumente usado em resfriamento e no processo de perda.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.oil.description: Pode ser queimado, explodido ou usado como resfriador.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: A maneira mais eficiente de resfriar qualquer coisa.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: O meca padro. Tem uma saida de dano e velocidade decente; Pode criar at 3 drones Para capacidades ofensivas aumentadas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Um meca rapido, De baixa armadura Feito for para ataques rapidos. Da pouco dano as estruturas, Mas pode matar grandes grupos de unidades inimigas muito rapidamente Com sua arma ARC.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: O meca de suporte. Conserta blocos aliados Atirando neles. Pode extinguir o fogo e consertar aliados em uma distancia Com sua habilidade de consertar.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Um meca volumoso e bem armadurado, Feito para assaltos da primeira linha. Sua habilidade de armadura Pode bloquear 90% de dano.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Nave padro. Consideravelmente leve e rapido, Tem pouca capacidade ofensiva E baixa velocidade de minerao.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Uma nave de espinhos de atacar e correr. Quando inicialmente lento, pode acelerar a altas velocidades e voar at bases inimigas, Dando altas quantidades de dano Com seus raios e habilidades.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Um bombardeiro pesado. Consideravelmente bem armadurado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Uma nave armada, bem armadurada. Com um repetidor incendario equipado. Boa acelerao e maxima velocidade.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.spirit.description: A unidade de drone inicial. Ele nasce no core por padro. Minera minrios automaticamente, Coleta itens e repara blocos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.phantom.description: Uma unidade de drone avanada. Minera minrios automaticamente, Coleta itens e repara blocos automaticamente. Significantemente mais efetiva.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.dagger.description: Unidade terrestre basica, Forte em grupos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.titan.description: Uma unidade armadurada terreste avancada. Usa carbide como munio. Ataca ambas as unidades de Aereas e terrestres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.fortress.description: Uma unidade pesada de artilharia terrestre.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.wraith.description: Uma unidade rapida, Interceptadora de bater e correr.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.ghoul.description: Um bombardeiro pesado. Usa composto de exploso Ou piratite como munio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduz areia a coque altamente puro Para fazer silicio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.kiln.description: Derrete chumbo e areia em Metavidro. Requer pequenas quantidades de energia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produz plastanio para usando oleo e titanio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produz tecido de fase de torio radioativo e grandes quantidades de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produz liga de surge de titanio, chumbo, silicio e cobre.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combina agua e titanio em cryo fluido que  mais eficiente em esfriar.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Usa oleo em Transformar piratite em composto de exploso menos inflamavel mas mais explosivo
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mistura carvo, Cobre e areia em piratite altamente inflamavel
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.melter.description: Aquece pedra em altas temperaturas para fazer lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.separator.description: Expos pedra em agua em presso para ter varios mineiras contendo na pedra.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Esmaga pedra em areia. Util quando esta em falta de areia natural.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.incinerator.description: Se livra de itens em excesso ou liquidos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-void.description: Destroi qualquer energia que entre dentro. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-source.description: Infinitivamente da energia. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.item-source.description: Infinivamente da itens. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroi qualquer item que entre sem requerir energia. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Infinitivamente da Liquidos. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Um bloco defensivo e barato.\nUtil para proteger o core e torres no comeo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Um bloco defensivo e barato.\nUtil para proteger o core e torres no comeo.\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nBoa proteo contra inimigos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Um bloco grande e defensivo.\nBoa proteo contra inimigos.\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-wall.description: No to forte quanto a parede de torio Mas vai defletir balas a menos que seja muito forte.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: No to forte quanto a parde de torio mas vai defletir balas a menos que seja muito forte.\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.surge-wall.description: O bloco defensivo mais forte.\nQue tem uma pequena chance de lancar um raio Contra o atacante.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: O bloco defensivo mais forte.\nQue tem uma pequena chance de lancar um raio Contra o atacante.\nOcupa multiplos espaos
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.door.description: Uma pequena porta que pode ser aberta o fechada quando voce clica.\nSe aberta, Os inimigos podem atirar e passar.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.door-large.description: Uma grande porta que pode ser aberta o fechada quando voce clica.\nSe aberta, Os inimigos podem atirar e passar..\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Aumenta a velocidade de unidades proximas de geradores e esteiras.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.force-projector.description: Cria um campo de forca hexagonal em volta de si mesmo, Protegendo construes e unidades dentro de dano por balas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Danifica inimigos em cima da mina. Quase invisivel ao inimigo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de item basico. Move os itens a frente e os deposita automaticamente Em torres ou construtores. Rotacionavel.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de item avancado. Move itens mais rapidos que esteiras padres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.junction.description: Funciona como uma ponte Para duas esteiras que estejam se cruzando. Util em situaes que tenha duas esteiras diferentes carregando materiais diferentes para lugares diferentes.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de itens avancado. Possibilita o transporte de itens acima de 3 blocos de construo ou paredes.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de item avanado. Usa energia para teleportar itens a uma esteira de fase sobre uma severa distancia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.router.description: Aceita itens de uma direo e os divide em 3 direes igualmente. Util para espalhar materiais da fonte para multiplos alvos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.distributor.description: Um roteador avancada que espalhas os itens em 7 outras direes igualmente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Uma combinao de roteador e divisor Que apenas manda para a esquerda e Direita se a frente estiver bloqueada.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Bloco de transporte de itens supremo. Coleta itens severos e atira eles em outro mass driver de uma longa distancia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Uma bomba barata mais saida de liquidos lenta, Sem consumo de energia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Uma bomba avancada que duplica a velocidade da saida de liquida usando energia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: A melhor bomba. Trez vezes mais rapida que a bomba mecanica e a unica bomba capaz de pegar lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.conduit.description: Bloco de transporte de liquido basico. Funciona como a esteira, Mas com liquidos. Melhor usado com extratores, Bombas ou condutos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Bloco avancado de transporte de liquido. Transporta liquidos mais rapido E armazena mais que os condutos padres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Aceita liquidos de uma direco e os joga em 3 direes igualmente. Pode armazenar uma certa quantidade de liquido. Util para espalhar liquidosd a fonte para multiplos alvos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Armazena grandes quantidades de liquido. Use quando a demanda de materiais no for constante ou para guardar itens para resfriar blocos vitais.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Age como uma ponte para dois canos que se cruzam. Util em situaes que tem dois condutos carregando liquidos diferentes at localizaes diferentes.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Bloco de transporte de liquidos avancados. Possibilita o transporte de liquido sobre 3 blocos acima de construes ou paredes
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Bloco avancado de transporte de liquido. Usa energia para teleportar liquidos conduto de fase sobre uma distancia severa.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmite poder em nodos. Maximo de 4 fontes de energia, sinks ou nodos podem ser conectados. Os nodos vo receber energia de ou dar energia para qualquer bloco adjacente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Tem um raio maior que o nodo de energia e pode conectar at 6 fontes de energia, sinks ou nodos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.battery.description: Guarda energia sempre que tiver em abundancia e da energia sempre que precisar enquanto tiver capacidade.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.battery-large.description: Guarda muito mais energia que uma beteria comum
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Gera poder usando combustivel ou oleo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Gera uma quantidade grande de energia usando lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: Mais eficiente que o gerador de Combusto, Mas requer agua adicional.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Um Gerador termoeltrico de radioistopos Que no precisa de refriamento Mas da muito mais energia que o reator de torio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Gera pequenas quantidades de energia do sol.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Da muito mais energia que o painel solar comum, Mas sua produo  mais cara.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Gera altas quantidades de energia do torio radioativo. Requer resfriamento constante. Vai explodir violentamente Se resfriamento insuficiente for fornecido.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Uma mineradoura barata. Quando colocado em blocos apropriados, retira itens em um ritmo lento e indefinitavamente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Uma mineradora improvisada que  mais rapida e capaz de processar mateirais mais duros usando a pressao do ar
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Possibilita a minerao ainda mais rapida usando tecnologia a laser, Mas requer poder adcionalmente torio radioativo pode ser recuperado com essa mineradora
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.blast-drill.description: A melhor mineradora. Requer muita energia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extrai agua do cho. Use quando no tive nenhum lago proximo
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultiva o solo com agua para pegar bio materia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Usa altas quantidades de energia Para extrair oleo da areia. Use quando no tiver fontes de oleo por perto
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.vault.description: Carrega uma alta quantidade de itens. Usado para criar fontes Quando no tem uma necessidade constante de materiais. Um[LIGHT_GRAY] Descarregador[] pode ser usado para recuperar esses itens do container.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.container.description: Carrega uma baixa quantidade de itens. Usado para criar fontes Quando no tem uma necessidade constante de materiais. Um[LIGHT_GRAY] Descarregador[] pode ser usado para recuperar esses itens do container.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.unloader.description: Descarrega itens de um container, Descarrega em uma esteira ou diretamente em um bloco adjacente. O tipo de item que pode ser descarregado pode ser mudado clicando no descarregador.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Lana montes de itens sem qualquer necessidade de um lanamento de nucleo. No completo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.wave.description: Uma torre que Tamanho medio que atira bolhas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.lancer.description: Uma torre de Tamanho-Medio que atira raios de eletricidade.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.arc.description: Uma pequena torre que atira eletricidade em um pequeno arc aleatoriamente no inimigo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.swarmer.description: Uma torre media que atira ondas de misseis.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.salvo.description: Uma torre media que da tiros em salvos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.fuse.description: Uma torre grande que atira raios de curta distancia poderosos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.ripple.description: Uma grande torre que atira simultaneamente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cyclone.description: Uma grande torre de tiro rapido.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.spectre.description: Uma grande torre que da dois tiros poderosos ao mesmo tempo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.meltdown.description: Uma grande torre que atira dois raios poderosos ao mesmo tempo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produz drones leves que mineram e reparam blocos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produz unidades de drone avancadas Que so significativamente mais efetivos que um drone spirit.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.wraith-factory.description: produz unidades interceptor de ataque rapido.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.revenant-factory.description: Produz unidades laser, pesadas e terrestres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.titan-factory.description: Produz unidades avancadas, armaduradas e terrestres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.fortress-factory.description: Produz unidades terrestres pesadas de artilharia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuamente repara a unidade danificada mais proxima.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para o rapido, Levemente armadurado meca feito para ataques rapidos.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para o meca de suporte que pode consertar construes aliadas e unidades.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para o volumoso e bem armadurado meca feito para ataques da primeira linha.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para um interceptador forte e rapido com armas de raio.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para um bombardeiro resionavelmente bem armadurado.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para grande, bem armadurada nave de combate.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.

bundle_se.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle_se.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]Note: There is no automatic global server list; if you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP.

bundle_se.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_se.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_se.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_se.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_se.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_se.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_se.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_se.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_se.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_se.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_se.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_se.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_se.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
bundle_se.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNING![]\nThis will clear all data, including saves, maps, unlocks and keybinds.\nOnce you press 'ok' the game will wipe all data and automatically exit.

bundle_se.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.drill:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Click the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[]. Place it on a copper vein by clicking.
[accent]Right-click[] to stop building.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].\nBuild a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.
Place a drill near to the turret
 Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the right of your core.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the right of your core.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory. Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_se.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_se.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_se.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_se.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_se.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_se.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle_se.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_se.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_se.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_se.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle_se.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_se.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_se.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_se.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_se.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle_se.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle_se.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard control mech. Based on a Dagger unit, with upgraded armor and building capabilities. Has more damage output than a Dart ship.
bundle_se.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_se.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_se.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_se.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard control ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_se.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning and missiles.
bundle_se.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber, built for construction and destroying enemy fortifications. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_se.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Highly maneuverable.
bundle_se.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_se.properties.unit.spirit.description: A modified draug drone, designed for repair instead of mining. Automatically fixes any damaged blocks in the area.
bundle_se.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Follows users. Assists in block construction.
bundle_se.properties.unit.dagger.description: The most basic ground mech. Cheap to produce. Overwhelming when used in swarms.
bundle_se.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_se.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced, armored ground unit. Attacks both ground and air targets. Equipped with two miniature Scorch-class flamethrowers.
bundle_se.properties.unit.fortress.description: A heavy artillery mech. Equipped with two modified Hail-type cannons for long-range assault on enemy structures and units.
bundle_se.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_se.properties.unit.wraith.description: A fast, hit-and-run interceptor unit. Targets power generators.
bundle_se.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Rips through enemy structures, targeting critital infrastructure.
bundle_se.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_se.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_se.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle_se.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle_se.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle_se.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle_se.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle_se.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle_se.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_se.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle_se.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle_se.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle_se.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_se.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle_se.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_se.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_se.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle_se.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle_se.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_se.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_se.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_se.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle_se.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_se.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle_se.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_se.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_se.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_se.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle_se.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_se.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router. Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_se.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle_se.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_se.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle_se.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_se.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_se.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_se.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_se.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_se.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_se.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range and more connections.
bundle_se.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_se.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_se.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_se.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_se.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_se.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_se.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_se.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_se.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_se.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_se.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_se.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_se.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_se.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_se.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_se.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_se.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_se.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_se.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_se.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_se.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_se.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_se.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_se.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_se.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_se.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_se.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_se.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_se.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_se.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_se.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_se.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_se.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_se.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range energy turret. Fires three piercing beams at nearby enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely poweful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_se.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_se.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle_se.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle_se.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_se.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a lightly armored hit-and-run attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into an advanced support mech.\nUse by tapping while st
bundle_se.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a heavily-armored missile mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a quick, lightly-armored interceptor.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a heavy support bomber.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.

bundle_tk.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
